highlights: Created RESTful API's using NodeJS and Express for custom web applications
Built SQL queries that powered data-driven apps and their front end consumption
Oversaw official myFSU mobile app development and maintenance
Managed web portal application for 40,000+ daily users
Developed web applications using Express, VueJS, and PostgreSQL
Designed and managed primary website using Drupal CMS
Led and supervised a team of web and digital communication interns
Ran consistent e-mail campaigns to over 200,000 constituents
Designed landing page and web application using Bootstrap
Managed all social media accounts and automated email responses
Worked with CEO to implement funding strategies

awards.summary: Passionate and effective full-stack developer with over 5 years of experience in producing enterprise-level web and mobile applications.
Key skills include: constructing NodeJS/Express API endpoints, implementing front-end Javascript (Vue & React) designs, and building SQL statements using PostgreSQL and SQL Developer.
